title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.1 - Right of entry to tracks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.1 - Right of entry to tracks

State Regulations

Members of the commission, the commission's staff and
the commission's designated representatives shall have the right of immediate, unrestricted and complete entry to any and all parts of all race tracks at any
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
